## Correspondance analysis


```{r}
#| warning: FALSE
colorSentimentScores$colourGroup <- colorGroups[colorSentimentScores$colour]
cols.df <- as.data.frame.matrix(table(colorSentimentScores$colourGroup, colorSentimentScores$meaning))
cols.df
chi <- chisq.test(cols.df)
chi

library(corrplot)
corrplot(chi$residuals, is.corr = FALSE, cl.pos = FALSE)





## coa <- ade4::dudi.coa(cols.df, scannf = FALSE, nf = 2)
coa <- FactoMineR::CA(cols.df)

library(factoextra) 
## row/colour contribution asymmetric biplot 
fviz_ca_biplot(coa, repel = TRUE, col.col = "brown", col.row = "purple",
               labelsize = 5, pointsize = 5, map = "rowprincipal") + ggtitle("") +
  theme_void()

## If the angle between two arrows is acute, then their is a strong association between the corresponding row and column.

# Dimension description
res.desc <- FactoMineR::dimdesc(coa, axes = c(1,2))
# Description of dimension 1 by row points
res.desc[[1]]$row
# Description of dimension 1 by column points
res.desc[[1]]$col
# Description of dimension 2 by row points
res.desc[[2]]$row
# Description of dimension 2 by column points
res.desc[[2]]$col
```
